"Observation of deep snow":
"Thank you for the observations in the darkening light.
Thanks to your help, a lot of good data was collected,
and I am busy now with the analysis of these data.
Having said that, the substances found at the ocean
walls at the Ocean Bottom are activated,
it seems that they become white crystals and
rain incessantly. What kind of phenomenon is this...
Even if it is just for one time, I will like to take a look.
If it is alright, can I request for you to observe?"

"暗化光の観察ではお世話になりました。
おかげでいいデータがたくさん集まりまして
今はその解析で大忙しです。
というのも海底にある壁面などの物質が
活性化すると、白い結晶となって
降り注ぐみたいなんですよ。
いったいどれほどの現象なのか……
一度で良いから、見てみたいんです。
よければ、観察をお願いできませんか。"
